I got a new job, I worked on a project that will help the people of Los Angeles

I joined hack4LA in April of 2020 right after graduating General Assembly it was my first design role outside of the boot camp. I was able to work on the 311 data project which is improving the lives of Angelinos. 

Using that foundation I was able to get a few freelance positions and eventually transition to being in the first cohort of Amazon's User Experience Research and Design Apprenticeship.
